title: Riot Pls? Refund the Rift.

embed.description: This is a call to arms for all veteran League of Legends players who are getting completely shit on due to the upcoming League update. Like & share plz, don't give up without a fight! No disrespect or hate towards any League player or employee, just expressing my own opinions on the subject.

body:
Viewer Discretion Is Advised. I'm sorry. Please Keep this post alive & leave a comment/up vote.

Edit: RIOT  RESPONDS VIDEO & TOPIC: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/bvYZZa5r-riot-responds-riot-pls-update

Listen here.. I've been playing this game for eight years. I probably have played more than 10,000 games of league across multiple accounts(smurfing). As I listened to this video I heard nothing that is meant to actually show players that have been at it the MOST that you actually give a rat's "nostril" about us and all the time we have spent playing this game. I don't even know where to begin to be honest. Anyone who thinks that some sort of refund or some sort of change of ip to blue essence is enough to make us "veterans" feel better about this change is simply incorrect.

It's not even the fact that you're changing things, you simply aren't doing enough for those of us who have spent LITERALLY months in game- at the keyboard- pressing q w e r r r r rr rr r to win game after game. The fact that you are trying to make this an "even playing field" or w/e it is you're doing by making runes free is a smack in the face.

I'm pissed. Let me tell you.. I have more than 6000 games played on one account- on which ive spent irl money on boosts. I own 99% of the champs, I have THE skin I want for 90% of the champs I play.. I have several rune pages, but I don't own every rune-so the thought that ALL of us veterans have truckloads of useless IP is ridiculous. I don't know what to say. I don't even know where to begin.. This is unacceptable.

To most vets- This is like your boss of 30 years telling you that you are ineligible for retirement. You're telling me you're raising the level cap but.. I'm not being boosted to the new cap? or even 90% of the way there? DO YOU NOT UNDERSTAND HOW MUCH WORK HOW MANY HOURS HOW MANY MINIONS I HAVE KILLED IN THIS GAME? THIS IS ROBBERY. THIS IS SUCK.

You don't get it. I cant even talk I'm so pissed. GREAT- you made it so champions & players can be more diverse freaking awesome... made it so people don't have to spend as much money on champs and skins you gave us chests for playing the game-good freakiing job. Awesome stuff. I'm sure a lot of us vets got some good skins from that ( we already had the champs thanks tho). Now you're making it even easier for new players to get involved in the game and play at the level they want to... Congrats to all you mofos in the future that never have to struggle the way RIOT's most loyal, most loving, most supportive group of players have had to. But what about us riot?

"You've spent 10,000 games on the rift. HERE HAVE A MOTHGER BFIICCNJL SUMMONER ICON" You haven't even done it yet and I already know what time it is. You better not. You are spitting on us.

Let me watch this video again real quick.........oh my god are you serious?
"FOR RUNES PURCHASED BEFORE 2017 we will give you 100 blue essence each." I need a button that tells me how much rp and IP I spent so I can gauge how much cursing I need to do when I tell my friends about this bs. Good job reducing the costs of everything so most players don't know how much they actually cost us vets. The cheapest runes USED to cost like 250 ip. BUT ANY RUNES BOUGHT SINCE THE 2017 SEASON GET A FULL REFUND? BOYYYYYYYYYYYY IM BOUT TO WOOP YO ASHE. So basically the new players who may quit after you take their tier 2 runes away get a refund but those who have been playing since ezreal's release get a taste of kogmaw's spittle? Bet.

For any rune page I spent 6300 IP on, you're gonna give me 1500 blue essence but blue essence is actually supposed to be equal to the old IP? GVGBHKFGVFVLSC <<That's a curse word riot.. fyi. For every 4 rune pages bought with RP I can get a great skin. TOO BAD IM A VET AND I BOUGHT MOST OF MY RUNE PAGES WITH IP AFTER I OWNED 90% OF THE CHAMPS AND RUNES I WANTED!!!! Talkin bout round up. Catch this Lee sin round house kick. OH YAY for a limited time we get to buy ward skins, icons and freaking chromas with the bs refund you gave us. Yall aint slick bih. YOU AINT SLICK. None of this is for us. None of this is for those who have slaved behind the buttons q w e r for the past decade. I have never seen such a blatant disregard for a loyal fan base.

You raising this level cap only means that I won't be in queue with some new level 30 that has only 100 wins WHEN I hit level 45 or w/e. This does nothing for us and to be honest if most long term vets aren't auto jumped to or near the new level cap I'll be disgusted along with everyone else.

You know why I have enough time to type all this? Cause I've spent 200 days in game. My first game ever- Soraka & Warwick toplane. I could heal that wolf and give him mana to keep him going. This is back when Jax could dodge spells, Xin's knockup was the most OP thing in this game. Do you get it yet? If not- guess what- you aren't supposed to. If you think you should understand how those who have been here since preseason 1 feel about this update you are sadly mistaken. If you think we are over reacting- understand we have been playing this game for the same amount of time it took you to get from 5th grade to your 12th grade graduation. DO NOT THINK THAT ME COMPLAINING IS NEARLY ENOUGH TO DESCRIBE HOW MISTREATED 99% OF VETS FEEL. & remember kids. You would not know how to dodge a single skillshot if not for the vets. You wouldn't know about wards, you wouldn't know about teamfights, you probably wouldn't even know about this game because most vets have 10-20-30-40 people that started playing league because of them. 

F yo icon. I know its coming. It will be known as the "We got f'ed icon" F'ed... You know what F'ed means? F'ed is when you play a game since it's release and spend in game currency to buy something that will be given to everyone 8 years later. F'ed is when what you earned is taken away and you get a 10% refund so that you can buy ward skins and chromas that nobody cares about as soon as "Minions have spawned" pops up on your screen. Pull up Big Sean - I don't F with you and play the video describing this BS again. Maybe then you'll get it.

All my veterans need to complain right here. Tell Riot how you feel!

Then, they looked at how much ip and runes players have floating and set prices and refunds to reach this level. Increasing the rune refund would just increase the blue essence prices.
> 
> A low rune refund means a low BE market price which means more value for the extra ip players have floating around. The players who benifit the most from this are veterans who have 100k+ ip floating around.
> 
> A higher rune refund, conversely, means a higher BE market price which in turn means a lower value for the extra ip we have floating around.
> 
> Riot already knows how much total rewards they want to give away and adjusting variables such as rune to ip refund and blue market essence prices just changes how these rewards are distributed. The more we campaign for a higher rune refund, the more we hurt long time veterans.

If by long time veterans you mean people with 100's thousands of ip stockpiled, then they shouldn't care for themselves if they get "hurt" by more fair refunds. They have more than enough ip as it is to get what they want. The point is that it isn't fair for the long time players that DON'T have 100's thousands of ip. They get the short stick because they don't have the ip to buy stuff, but they also don't get the refund because they have been playing since before 2017.

And just to be clear I have all the ip I could want for the upcoming sales. I'm complaining so that everyone might have a chance to be treated fairly by riot.

throwing all or most of these rewards out to those who'd got them by now would leave them in exactly the same situation as before. With no other goal other than play for fun... wich is nothing wrong at all, but Riot wanted to do this, so they wont make the 'veterans' skip the system which basicly is DESIGNED for them!

I don't understand the massive hate.  I own all the champions, 16 rune pages, well over 100 runes, and have at least 1 good skin for every champion I play.  Would I love it if all my runes got refunded 100%?  Yeah, it would be nice.  Is it necessary.  Hell no.  Once the conversion happens I'll have around 100K blue essence.  Under the old system my IP would have been pretty much worthless except for the biannual chroma sales and to instantly buy every new champion that comes out.  At least under the new system I'll be able to buy  chromas, ward skins, icons and maybe even a super rare skin if I grind a lot before then.  Its a net gain no matter how you look at it.

At the end of the day yes we are losing some time investment but if you honestly expected to get a good return on PLAYING A VIDEO GAME then you really need to wake up.  Most video games die out and all the time you invested is worth literally nothing.

I'm happy Riot is making these changes because it will make the experience MUCH better for newer players.  Furthermore, while I'm not getting a 100% return I will be able to pick up some cool stuff once pre-season hits so that's not bad at all.  I honestly would have been fine if they made runes free and didn't give ANY refund because its just the right thing to do.

Your complaint is like you buying groceries and then getting pissed off that the grocery store donates leftover food to a homeless shelter.  Its not at all like being denied a pension because you aren't actually losing anything.  You got value out of the runes for 7 seasons.  Now you get the NEW runes for FREE and you get a partial refund on your old runes.
